slides.title: Indian Geography
slides.content:
**Location:** South Asia, 7 neighbors
**Rivers:** Ganga, Yamuna, Brahmaputra
**Mountains:** Himalayas (highest)
**States:** 28 + 8 UTs

slides.title: World Geography
slides.content:
**Continents:** 7 (Asia largest)
**Oceans:** 5 (Pacific largest)
**Longest River:** Nile (Africa)
**Highest Peak:** Mt. Everest (Nepal/China)
